name: Abuna Acolyte
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.
flavor_text: "You can break nothing I cannot mend."

name: Arrest
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

name: Auriok Edgewright
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Auriok Edgewright has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Auriok soldiers craft their own weapons, forging a connection to the steel with each blow of the hammer.

name: Auriok Sunchaser
oracle_text: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Auriok Sunchaser gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor_text:
"Grant me loft. Grant me light. Grant me the accuracy I need to kill all who threaten Bladehold."
—Prayer to the Whitesun

name: Dispense Justice
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Metalcraft — That player sacrifices two attacking creatures instead if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: The Accorders never strike first, but they always strike back.

name: Elspeth Tirel
oracle_text: +2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
−2: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
−5: Destroy all other permanents except for lands and tokens.

name: Fulgent Distraction
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.
flavor_text:
"Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."
—Yavash of the Accorders

name: Ghalma's Warden
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Ghalma's Warden gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: A special unit guards the loxodon artificer known as Ghalma the Shaper. They are armed and armored in her finest works of silver and steel.

name: Glimmerpoint Stag
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Glint Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
When Glint Hawk enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Its eyes burned nearly blind by the Whitesun, it hunts by metallic gleam.

name: Indomitable Archangel
oracle_text: Flying
Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand."
—Auriok proverb

name: Kemba, Kha Regent
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.
flavor_text: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

name: Kemba's Skyguard
oracle_text: Flying
When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . ‘strange.' Regent's orders."
—Ranya, skyhunter captain

name: Leonin Arbiter
oracle_text: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."

name: Loxodon Wayfarer
flavor_text: The Mirran elders vanished with Memnarch, leaving behind a generation of wayward orphans.

name: Myrsmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
flavor_text: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

name: Razor Hippogriff
oracle_text: Flying
When Razor Hippogriff enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: She incubates her eggs in gold and mana.

name: Revoke Existence
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."
—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

name: Salvage Scout
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Salvage Scout: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I'm not saying it's dangerous work. I'm just saying don't sign up if you have plans for your seventieth birthday."

name: Seize the Initiative
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: The time between spotting a leonin shikari and feeling its claws is just time enough to draw your last breath.

name: Soul Parry
oracle_text: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Sunblast Angel
oracle_text: Flying
When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.
flavor_text: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

name: Sunspear Shikari
oracle_text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
flavor_text: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

name: Tempered Steel
oracle_text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve."
—Ghalma the Shaper

name: True Conviction
oracle_text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.
flavor_text: Dozens of spells known only to the Auriok elders were lost, but the next generation, galvanized by war, devised even more potent magic.

name: Vigil for the Lost
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life.
flavor_text: "As she grew cold in my arms, I swore an oath that her funeral pyre would be dwarfed by a bonfire of our enemies."

name: Whitesun's Passage
oracle_text: You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: All over the Razor Fields, Whitesun is celebrated. Even the followers of the rebel Juryan, far from the Cave of Light, bow their heads in reverence.

name: Argent Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
Metalcraft — {U}: Exile Argent Sphinx. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: A great mirage, a dream of wings and silver.

name: Bonds of Quicksilver
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

name: Darkslick Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Darkslick Drake dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: At the edge of the Mephidross, Phyrexia's influence seeps into life and land.

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Most casualties of the power struggle between vedalken and Neurok didn't die on the field of battle; they merely disappeared.

name: Dissipation Field
oracle_text: Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Strike me once, shame on you. Strike me twice . . . Well, let's just see if you can."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Grand Architect
oracle_text: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1.
{U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn.
Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

name: Halt Order
oracle_text: Counter target artifact spell.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An artificer's least favorite mind-missive may be "I regret to inform you that the funding for your project has been cut."

name: Inexorable Tide
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"See how gratefully this world accepts our blessings."
—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

name: Lumengrid Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Metalcraft — When Lumengrid Drake enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Properly outfitted, drakes made perfect sentries for vedalken strongholds.

name: Neurok Invisimancer
oracle_text: Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked.
When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

name: Plated Seastrider
flavor_text: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

name: Quicksilver Gargantuan
oracle_text: You may have Quicksilver Gargantuan enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's 7/7.
flavor_text:
"You know you have achieved true power if the sea itself seeks to emulate your greatness."
—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

name: Riddlesmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

name: Scrapdiver Serpent
oracle_text: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.
flavor_text: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

name: Screeching Silcaw
oracle_text: Flying
Metalcraft — Whenever Screeching Silcaw deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: It's adaptively deaf to its own cries.

name: Shape Anew
oracle_text: The controller of target artifact sacrifices it, then reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal an artifact card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.

name: Sky-Eel School
oracle_text: Flying
When Sky-Eel School enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: They swim on tides few can see, away from a threat few yet understand.

name: Steady Progress
oracle_text: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."

name: Stoic Rebuttal
oracle_text: Metalcraft — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

name: Thrummingbird
oracle_text: Flying

Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

name: Trinket Mage
oracle_text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Turn Aside
oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor_text: "It's not my job to ask our leaders about their experiments at the Knowledge Pool. It's my job to make sure they can continue performing them."

name: Twisted Image
oracle_text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."
—Politus, vedalken emisar

name: Vault Skyward
oracle_text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text:
"The edges of the Quicksilver Sea run dark with the spread of the Mephidross. Two more aerial passes before I can be sure what I'm seeing . . ."
—Lafarius, Neurok sky agent

name: Vedalken Certarch
oracle_text: Metalcraft — {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."

name: Volition Reins
oracle_text: Enchant permanent
When Volition Reins enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it.
You control enchanted permanent.
flavor_text: "Glorifying the will is a mistake. It is simply one more force to be mastered."

name: Blackcleave Goblin
oracle_text: Haste
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"Bitten? Save time, amputate now."
—Lephar, loxodon surgeon

name: Bleak Coven Vampires
oracle_text: Metalcraft — When Bleak Coven Vampires enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.

name: Blistergrub
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"The sooner you join Phyrexia, the sooner you'll forget your painful rebirth."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Carnifex Demon
oracle_text: Flying
Carnifex Demon enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{B}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Carnifex Demon: Put a -1/-1 counter on each other creature.
flavor_text: Every contagion has a host.

name: Contagious Nim
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Corrupted Harvester
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Corrupted Harvester.
flavor_text:
"Before the blessed assault begins, we must seek specimens that are well-adapted to our way of . . . life."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Dross Hopper
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Dross Hopper gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Bred in the vicious Mephidross, dross hoppers learned to eat quickly and escape faster.

name: Exsanguinate
oracle_text: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.

name: Flesh Allergy
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.

name: Fume Spitter
oracle_text: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

{X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard.

name: Grasp of Darkness
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: On a world with five suns, night is compelled to become an aggressive force.

name: Hand of the Praetors
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Other creatures you control with infect get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell with infect, target player gets a poison counter.

name: Ichor Rats
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When Ichor Rats enters the battlefield, each player gets a poison counter.

name: Instill Infection
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."
—Vedalken research notes

name: Memoricide
oracle_text: Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.
flavor_text: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."

name: Moriok Reaver
flavor_text:
"The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Necrogen Scudder
oracle_text: Flying
When Necrogen Scudder enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: Contrary to popular belief, it's kept aloft by necrogen gas, not the screaming agony of a thousand murdered souls.

name: Necrotic Ooze
oracle_text: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor_text:
"To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Painful Quandary
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless they discard a card.
flavor_text:
"For each word spoken, one forgotten. For each thought, a memory rotten."
—Moriok incantation

name: Painsmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

name: Plague Stinger
oracle_text: Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

name: Psychic Miasma
oracle_text: Target player discards a card. If a land card is discarded this way, return Psychic Miasma to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"A mind may be steeled against madness, but all battlements fall in time."
—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

name: Relic Putrescence
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, its controller gets a poison counter.
flavor_text:
"Until we shed the curse of sentience, we must endure its grotesque handiwork."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Skinrender
oracle_text: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

name: Tainted Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"Welcome to perfection."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Arc Trail
oracle_text: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to another target.
flavor_text:
"Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom."
—Spear-Tribe teaching

name: Assault Strobe
oracle_text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: When breaking someone's face once just isn't enough.

name: Barrage Ogre
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was thrown at them.

name: Blade-Tribe Berserkers
oracle_text: Metalcraft — When Blade-Tribe Berserkers enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, Blade-Tribe Berserkers gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.

name: Bloodshot Trainee
oracle_text: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "Just think how strong I'll be if my arms don't tear off!"

name: Cerebral Eruption
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals the top card of their library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost to that player and each creature that player controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.

name: Embersmith
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Embersmith deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The Vulshok see the artificer as a catalyst, bringing the spark of creation that ignites change.

name: Ferrovore
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Ferrovore gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Vulshok use its digestion to break down the most obstinate metals, from darksteel myr to seastrider plates.

name: Flameborn Hellion
oracle_text: Haste
Flameborn Hellion attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"The most reliable omen of a future hellion attack is a past hellion attack."
—Spear-Tribe teaching

name: Furnace Celebration
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {2}. If you do, Furnace Celebration deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Reduce. Reuse. Wreak havoc.

name: Galvanic Blast
oracle_text: Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target.
Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage to that permanent or player instead if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Mirrodin has little weather, but it certainly has lightning.

name: Goblin Gaveleer
oracle_text: Trample
Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.
flavor_text:
"When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

name: Koth of the Hammer
oracle_text: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
−2: Add {R} for each Mountain you control.
−5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘{T}: This land deals 1 damage to any target.'"

name: Kuldotha Phoenix
oracle_text: Flying, haste
Metalcraft — {4}: Return Kuldotha Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control three or more artifacts.

name: Kuldotha Rebirth
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: All goblin rituals serve a dual purpose as fertility rites, even the destructive ones. Especially the destructive ones.

name: Melt Terrain
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text: Just as the most finely wrought metal can warp and rust, so too does Mirrodin buckle under pressures from without and within.

name: Molten Psyche
oracle_text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, Molten Psyche deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards that player has drawn this turn.

name: Ogre Geargrabber
oracle_text: Whenever Ogre Geargrabber attacks, gain control of target Equipment an opponent controls until end of turn. Attach it to Ogre Geargrabber. When you lose control of that Equipment, unattach it.
flavor_text: Long reach, short attention span.

name: Oxidda Daredevil
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: Oxidda Daredevil gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: His goggles spattered with grime and his mouth full of bugs, he tossed the engines another priceless relic.

name: Oxidda Scrapmelter
oracle_text: When Oxidda Scrapmelter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: It subsists on a diet rich in screaming metal and molten blood.

name: Scoria Elemental
flavor_text: A single molten cord links it to the subterranean furnaces, drawing heat and metal from beneath Kuldotha. Until that bond is cut, it carves a swath of raw destruction.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"I am an artist, a builder, a creator . . . I create the biggest explosions around."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Spikeshot Elder
oracle_text: {1}{R}{R}: Spikeshot Elder deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor_text: Now that he knows a thousand ways of hurting people, his next shamanic quest is to discover a thousand more.

name: Tunnel Ignus
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Fight mischief with mischief.

name: Turn to Slag
oracle_text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
flavor_text:
"If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Vulshok Heartstoker
oracle_text: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: He fashions stirring words with as much passion as a smith fashioning a warhammer.

name: Acid Web Spider
oracle_text: Reach
When Acid Web Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Equipment.
flavor_text: Its web is an excellent source of found copper for the daring or the stupid.

name: Alpha Tyrranax
flavor_text: Hunger seized the tyrranax, and the Sylvok's vision quest ended in disaster.

name: Asceticism
oracle_text: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text:
"Let my ignominy build walls thicker than iron and stronger than darksteel."
—Thrun, the last troll

name: Bellowing Tanglewurm
oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Other green creatures you control have intimidate.

name: Blight Mamba
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Blight Mamba.
flavor_text: Its venom drips with Phyrexia's hate.

name: Blunt the Assault
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"Much can be gained from the appearance of vulnerability."
—Ezuri, renegade leader

name: Carapace Forger
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Carapace Forger gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "Bows and whips cannot save us from these new horrors of the Mephidross."

name: Carrion Call
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with infect. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: The natural order is out of order.

name: Copperhorn Scout
oracle_text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.
flavor_text: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

name: Cystbearer
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Phyrexia strives to simulate natural life, but it can't resist improving on the design.

name: Engulfing Slagwurm
oracle_text: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text: Its teeth exist only for decoration.

name: Ezuri, Renegade Leader
